performance.title: Performance
performance.text: Astro ships 0 kB of JS by default; Preact runtime only loads in islands (<30 kB gzip first load).

batteries.title: Batteries‑included
batteries.text: ESLint, Prettier, Vitest, Husky, Commitlint, Rosetta i18n, Zustand state, image optimisation & more configured out of the box.

theme.title: Live Theme
theme.text: Update colors, radius and spacing in real‑time via Zustand store + CSS variables.

security.title: Secure
security.text: Optional Jscrambler integration to obfuscate production JS bundles.

island.title: Astro Islands

what.title: What is an Island?
what.description: In Astro, an Island is an isolated interactive component inside a static HTML page. It can be a Client Island (hydrated in browser) or Server Island (dynamic server-side content).

how.title: How it Works
items: 🌊 Most of the page is pure static HTML.
🔀 You can mix different frameworks on the same page.
🛡️ Each island runs isolated but can share state.

directives.title: Client Directives
directives.description: Astro lets you control when to load an Island using directives:

benefits.title: Why Use Islands?
items: ⚡ Ultra-fast load: HTML/CSS first, JS only when needed.
🎯 Fine-grained control over performance and UX.
🛠️ Migrate or mix multiple frameworks easily.

island.tip: Tip: use Islands only for interactive parts, keeping the rest static and ultra-fast.
